marklogic.body: I am asking again, how come the construction get over zoning regulations and got permit to build a 37000 venue and only 5700 parking Spots which only 1800 are available to the public...??. Guess who is never going to be there...?, all the fans after they get their forst visit experience, ha, ha, ha. Samson, Loria, you know already what you can do with your dream, right...?, you both can use Vaseline though...ha, ha, ha
